cz.syntea.xdef.sys

Class Report

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.syntea.xdef.sys.Report
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReportPrinter

    public class Report
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides container of a report. Report object has following fields:
    • - type of report (see constants)
    • - the identifier of the report (composed of the prefix and of the report identifier)
    • - the primary text of report used if id was not found in report table (see RegisterReportTables.ReportTable)or if _reportId is null
    • - modification string containing the information for setting parameters of the report. The parameters have the format "&{parameter_name}" followed by parameter value
    • - the timestamp information added to report (if required)

    The manager of report texts is described in RegisterReportTables.ReportTable). There is described also the format of report files.

    If the modification string is not equal to null, then it is used for modification of parameters in the report text. If parameter specification is followed by the sequence "{inserted_text}", the inserted_text is inserted before the value of the parameter. Specification of "{&default text&inserted_text}" may be used to specify default text and/or inserted text. After specification of the inserted text may follow the specification of "(appended_text)" - in this case the appended_text is appended after the value of parameter. If the parameter is not present in the modification string then the whole parameter description is replaced by the empty string.

    Examples of source report text and modification strings:

    
 report text: "a &{p} &{q} b"
   modification string: null
   result: "a   b"
   modification string: "&{p}xy&{q}z"
   result: "a xy z b"

 report text: "a&{p}{x}b"
   modification string: null
   result: "ab"
   modification string: "&{p}z"
   result: "axzb"

 report text: "a&{p}{x}{y}b"
   modification string: null
   result: "ab"
   modification string: "&{p}z"
   result: "axzyb"

 report text: "a&{p}{&u&x}{y}b"
   modification string: null
   result: "aub"
   modification string: "&{p}z"
   result: "axzyb"

 report text: "Error&{p}{, pos=}"
   modification string: null
   result: "Error"
   modification string: "&{p}123"
   result: "Error, pos= 123"

 report text: "Error&{p}{& on undefined position& on position }"
   modification string: null
   result: "Error on undefined position"
   modification string: "&{p}123"
   result: "Error on position 123"

      • getLocalizedText

        public final java.lang.String getLocalizedText(java.lang.String language)
        Create localized text of report in the language specified by argument. If the text with this language is not available it will be returned the in primary language (usually English).
        Parameters:
        language - language id (ISO-639). If this argument is null then it will be used the local language from system settings).
        Returns:
        text of report in specified language.

        Parameters:
        w - SObjectWriter where to write.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs.

      • readObj

        public static Report readObj(SObjectReader r)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Read report from the SObjectReader.
        Parameters:
        r - SObjectReader where to read.
        Returns:
        report from the SObjectReader
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs.
